workflow.description: Transcoder based on Avisynth, x262, x264, x265 and FFMpeg, developed by Steinar Apalnes, implemented by Francesco Bucciantini, Livio Aloja and an Open Source Community

nodes.name: x262 (XDCAM50)
nodes.description: Encoding: x262 video codec + LAV PCM audio codec + ffmpeg wrapper (muxer). XDCAM50

properties.script:
# Variables:
#
# m_clip		= The last returned AviSynth media
#
# Do NOT change any of the following variables!!!
# _ffas_video 	= <original video>
# _ffas_audio	= <original audio>
# _ffas_height	= <source height>
# _ffas_width	= <source width>
# _m_clip_a_channels = <total channels>
# _ffas_work_fdr	= Working folder for the workflow
#

r=ResampleAudio(m_clip, 48000)
n=Normalize(r, 0.22)
m_clip=ConvertAudioTo24bit(n)

# The following MUST be the last line of your script
Return m_clip

nodes.description:
Levels, brings luma and chroma in limited tv range, automatic white balance, sharpening, upscale with Spline64 + NNEDI
16:9
nodes.name: Post Processing

properties.script:
# Variables:
#
# m_clip		= The last returned AviSynth media
#
# Do NOT change any of the following variables!!!
# _ffas_video 	= <original video>
# _ffas_audio	= <original audio>
# _ffas_height	= <source height>
# _ffas_width	= <source width>
# _m_clip_a_channels = <total channels>
# _ffas_work_fdr	= Working folder for the workflow
#
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\ResizeKAR.avsi")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\SeeSaw.avsi")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\Zs_RF_Shared.avsi")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\plugins_JPSDR.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\RgTools.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\MaskTools\x64\masktools2.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\MVTools2\x64\mvtools2.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\MVTools2\x64\DePan.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\HDRCore-x64.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\HDRMatrix-x64.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\HDRNoise-x64.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\HDRSharp-x64.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\AddGrainC.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\dfttest.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\EEDI2.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\eedi3.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\fft3dfilter.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\KNLMeansCL.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\TDeint.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\TIVTC.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\yadifmod2.dll")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\QTGMC.avsi")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\KillerSpots.avsi")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\neo-fft3d.dll")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\SpotLess.avsi")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\MedianBlur2.dll")



#Bring everything to 16bit planar
HBD=ConvertBits(m_clip, bits=16)

#Convert to 4:2:2 planar 16bit
c=Converttoyuv422(HBD, matrix="Rec601")

#De-Sport 16bit planar
KillerSpots(c, comp=false)
RequestLinear()
#SpotLess(RadT=6, ThSAD2=900, pel=4, chroma=true)
QTGMC( Preset="Placebo", InputType=1)

#Degrain in 16bit planar
super = MSuper(pel=2, sharp=1)
bv1 = MAnalyse(super, isb = true, delta = 1, overlap=4)
fv1 = MAnalyse(super, isb = false, delta = 1, overlap=4)
bv2 = MAnalyse(super, isb = true, delta = 2, overlap=4)
fv2 = MAnalyse(super, isb = false, delta = 2, overlap=4)
degrain=MDegrain2(super,bv1,fv1,bv2,fv2,thSADC=1200, thSAD=1200)

#Spatial denoise 16bit planar
denoise=dfttest(degrain, sigma=64, tbsize=1, lsb_in=false, lsb=false, Y=true, U=true, V=true, dither=0)

#Upscale to FULL HD with Spline64 + NNEDI and 16bit planar precision
resized=nnedi3_rpow2(denoise, cshift="Spline64ResizeMT", rfactor=2, fwidth=1920, fheight=1080, nsize=4, nns=4, qual=1, etype=0, pscrn=2, threads=40, csresize=true, mpeg2=true, threads_rs=0, logicalCores_rs=true, MaxPhysCore_rs=true, SetAffinity_rs=false)

#From 16bit planar to 16bit interleaved
interleaved=ConvertToDoubleWidth(resized)

#Matrix Conversion from BT601 to BT709 with 16bit interleaved precision
color=Matrix(interleaved, from=601, to=709, rg=1.0, gg=1.0, bg=1.0, a=16, b=235, ao=16, bo=235, bitdepth=16)

#From 16bit interleaved to 16bit planar
planar=ConvertFromDoubleWidth(color)

#Dithering from 16bit planar to 8bit planar with the Floyd-Steinberg error diffusion
dithered=ConvertBits(planar, bits=8, dither=1)

#Limiter TV Range 0.0 - 0.7V
m_clip=Limiter(dithered, min_luma=16, max_luma=235, min_chroma=16, max_chroma=240)

# The following MUST be the last line of your script
Return m_clip

nodes.name: Post Processing

properties.script:
# Variables:
#
# m_clip		= The last returned AviSynth media
#
# Do NOT change any of the following variables!!!
# _ffas_video 	= <original video>
# _ffas_audio	= <original audio>
# _ffas_height	= <source height>
# _ffas_width	= <source width>
# _m_clip_a_channels = <total channels>
# _ffas_work_fdr	= Working folder for the workflow
#

Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\ResizeKAR.avsi")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\SeeSaw.avsi")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\Zs_RF_Shared.avsi")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\plugins_JPSDR.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\RgTools.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\MaskTools\x64\masktools2.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\MVTools2\x64\mvtools2.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\MVTools2\x64\DePan.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\HDRCore-x64.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\HDRMatrix-x64.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\HDRNoise-x64.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\HDRSharp-x64.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\AddGrainC.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\dfttest.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\EEDI2.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\eedi3.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\fft3dfilter.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\KNLMeansCL.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\TDeint.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\TIVTC.dll")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\yadifmod2.dll")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\QTGMC.avsi")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\KillerSpots.avsi")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\neo-fft3d.dll")
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\SpotLess.avsi")
LoadPlugin("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\MedianBlur2.dll")


#Bring everything to 16bit planar
HBD=ConvertBits(m_clip, bits=16)

#Convert to 4:2:2 planar 16bit
c=Converttoyuv422(HBD, matrix="Rec601")

#De-Sport 16bit planar
KillerSpots(c, comp=false)
RequestLinear()
#SpotLess(RadT=6, ThSAD2=900, pel=4, chroma=true)
QTGMC( Preset="Placebo", InputType=1)

#Degrain in 16bit planar
RequestLinear()
super = MSuper(pel=2, sharp=1)
bv1 = MAnalyse(super, isb = true, delta = 1, overlap=4)
fv1 = MAnalyse(super, isb = false, delta = 1, overlap=4)
bv2 = MAnalyse(super, isb = true, delta = 2, overlap=4)
fv2 = MAnalyse(super, isb = false, delta = 2, overlap=4)
degrain=MDegrain2(super,bv1,fv1,bv2,fv2,thSADC=1200, thSAD=1200)

#Spatial denoise 16bit planar
denoise=dfttest(degrain, sigma=64, tbsize=1, lsb_in=false, lsb=false, Y=true, U=true, V=true, dither=0)

#Adding borders for 1.33 PB 4:3 with 16bit planar precision
borders=AddBorders(denoise, 152, 0, 152, 0)

#Upscale to FULL HD with Spline64 + NNEDI and 16bit planar precision
resized=nnedi3_rpow2(borders, cshift="Spline64ResizeMT", rfactor=2, fwidth=1920, fheight=1080, nsize=4, nns=4, qual=1, etype=0, pscrn=2, threads=40, csresize=true, mpeg2=true, threads_rs=0, logicalCores_rs=true, MaxPhysCore_rs=true, SetAffinity_rs=false)

#From 16bit planar to 16bit interleaved
interleaved=ConvertToDoubleWidth(resized)

#Matrix Conversion from BT601 to BT709 with 16bit interleaved precision
color=Matrix(interleaved, from=601, to=709, rg=1.0, gg=1.0, bg=1.0, a=16, b=235, ao=16, bo=235, bitdepth=16)

#From 16bit interleaved to 16bit planar
planar=ConvertFromDoubleWidth(color)

#Dithering from 16bit planar to 8bit planar with the Floyd-Steinberg error diffusion
dithered=ConvertBits(planar, bits=8, dither=1)

#Limiter TV Range 0.0 - 0.7V
m_clip=Limiter(dithered, min_luma=16, max_luma=235, min_chroma=16, max_chroma=240)

# The following MUST be the last line of your script
Return m_clip
